name: Castlevania - The Lost Belmont
description:
1792. The prophecy tells that this is the year Dracula is going to come back. Transylvania is already filled with monsters. A bad omen.

But still, everyone knows that the last of the Belmont is training to be prepared for Dracula's return: Richter, the last heir to the Belmont lineage and wielder of the Vampire Killer. 

However, few know of his younger brother, Hanz. 

Always living in the shadow of the older sibling, he trained just as hard, but never got as much praise. 

As long as he remembers, they always acted like rivals, but everyone always stayed on Richter's side.

Then, after hearing some rumors of a strange wanderer that could give him a way to find strength enough for him to be the one to defeat Dracula, Hanz decide to follow on his teachings, hoping to be able to best his brother in the battle against evil. 

This is Hanz journey to prove himself and be able to stand up against Dracula's revived, but will he be capable to do it?
